nodes.documentation: @title Defines public interface for polls: how to interact and what could be asked.
nodes.name: PollInterface

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets poll's owner address
nodes.name: owner

nodes.documentation: @notice Gets if poll is active or not
nodes.name: active
memberOptions
hasMember
setPollListener

nodes.documentation: @notice Initializes a poll. Should not activate poll on this stage.
nodes.name: init

nodes.documentation: @notice Votes for a picked option. Usually numbers from `1` to max value are used.
nodes.name: vote

nodes.documentation: @notice Activates poll, so users can start voting.
nodes.name: activatePoll

nodes.documentation: @notice Ends poll, stops any activity and users couldn't vote anymore.
nodes.name: endPoll

nodes.documentation: @notice Eliminates poll, should be allowed to perform before activation or after poll will end.
nodes.name: killPoll

nodes.documentation: @notice Get full poll details
nodes.name: getDetails

nodes.documentation: @notice Get information about current poll situation for existed options: how much tokens are placed for which options.
nodes.name: getVotesBalances
updatePollDetailsIpfsHash

nodes.documentation: @title Defines an interface for poll listener
nodes.name: PollListenerInterface

nodes.documentation: @notice Delegate method. Should be used only by poll instance during activation
nodes.name: onActivatePoll

nodes.documentation: @notice Delegate method. Should be used only by poll instance during voting
nodes.name: onVote

nodes.documentation: @notice Delegate method. Should be used only by poll instance during ending a poll
nodes.name: onEndPoll

nodes.documentation: @notice Delegate method. Should be used only by poll instance during killing a poll
nodes.name: onRemovePoll
